performance.dashboardDescription: Real-time monitoring of application performance metrics, including Core Web Vitals, network requests, component rendering, and memory usage

error.title: Page Error
error.message: An error occurred on the page. Please refresh or contact support
error.description: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try refreshing the page or contact support for help.
error.NETWORK_ERROR: Network connection failed. Please check your network settings and try again.
error.TIMEOUT_ERROR: Request timed out. Please check your network and try again, or switch to 4G.
error.SERVER_ERROR: The server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error.PERMISSION_DENIED: You don't have permission to perform this operation.
error.RESOURCE_LOAD_FAILED: Resource loading failed. Please check your network and try again.
error.VALIDATION_ERROR: Please check if your input information is correct.
error.COLLABORATION_ERROR: Collaboration feature is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error.INVITE_ERROR: Failed to send invitation. Please try again later.
error.MODEL_SWITCH_ERROR: Failed to switch model. Please try again later.
error.MODEL_TIMEOUT: AI model response timed out. Please try switching to another model.
error.MODEL_ERROR: AI model processing failed. Please try again later.
error.TIANJIN_ASSETS_ERROR: Tianjin material library loading failed. Please try again later.
error.BROWSER_COMPAT_ERROR: Your browser version is too low. It is recommended to upgrade Chrome to version 90+ for the best experience.
error.DEFAULT_ERROR: Operation failed. Please try again later.
error.FORBIDDEN_ERROR: You don't have permission to access this resource.
error.CORS_ERROR: Cross-origin request failed. Please contact the administrator.
error.TEXTURE_ERROR: Texture loading failed. Please check your network and try again.
error.CANVAS_ERROR: Canvas operation failed. Please check browser compatibility.
error.WEBGL_ERROR: WebGL initialization failed. Please check browser support.
